infringe.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to do something that is against a law or someone’s legal rights
infringe.translation[0].definitions[0].e: A backup copy of a computer program does not infringe copyright.
infringe.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to do something that is against a law or someone’s legal rights
infringe.translation[1].definitions[0].e: There was no evidence that Apple’s work was infringing Xerox copyrights.
We’ll be watching closely to see whether they infringe on our patents.
